strings.Value: "Thank you for the gift."
[Kiss Tristian]
"You really shouldn't have."
"I can't accept this gift, Tristian. But before you say anything else: let's stop here and now."
"I love you too."
"Yes. Everything is over."
[Pull Tristian close] "Less talk, more action."
{n}Tristian hands you a package.{/n} "I got something for you."
"I knew you wouldn't like a useless toy. But I hope you like this."
"I was thinking about what might make you happy... and decided to do what you do â€” listen to my heart. I hope I didn't make a mistake."

{n}Tristian lingers a moment, then comes closer and runs the tips of his fingers over your cheek.{/n} "I wanted to say that... I'm so happy. When I was languishing in Nyrissa's dungeon, trapped by her sleeping spell and tormented by nightmares, I could only guess how my wanderings on {g|Golarion}Golarion{/g} would end..."

{n}Tristian shakes his head.{/n} "I wanted to do something nice for you. All these endless battles and threats... Nyrissa, Armag, Irovetti... and there are more trials ahead. I wanted to distract you a bit with something pleasant."

{n}Tristian freezes. For a few moments he can't find the right words.{/n} "That... is very unexpected. Well... so be it. But please keep the gift. Let it be a gesture of friendship and appreciation." {n}The deva lowers his head and looks away.{/n}

"{g|Sarenrae}Sarenrae's{/g} light warms me again, but your warmth, so familiar and alive... is what returned me to life and faith. There's nothing I could give that could repay you. But everything I have is yours. Know this."
{n}The deva holds you tenderly and pulls you closer. You smell a faint whiff of heather, and Tristian's lips find yours.{/n}
{n}The deva freezes for a moment, and then answers your kiss. You feel his hands wrap around you and pull you closer.{/n}

{n}Tristian pulls away ever so slightly, his breath tickling your lips.{/n} "I love you. I always have. Since we first met. And I was so afraid I'd be your downfall. But not now... Now... everything is over."

{n}Tristian chuckles and kisses you again, and this time his kiss is firmer and more determined. Leaning to your ear, he whispers softly.{/n} "I want to be alone with you so much. Just you and I. Perhaps later... when we get home..."
{n}Tristian smiles and almost playfully kisses your ear, and then whispers.{/n} "I hope some time... when we are back home, we'll have a little alone time. Just the two of us."

{n}Tristian kisses you again, and this time his kiss is longer and more tender. He pulling away a little, and exhales ever so softly.{/n} "I want to be alone with you so much... Perhaps back home, after everything calms down a little..."
{n}Touching your cheek, Tristian steps away.{/n}
